title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977),
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Climate, Energy and the Environment
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Climate, Energy and the Environment 

(Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2025. 

(2) This Order shall come into operation on the 2nd day of August 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited climate energy environment (delegation ministerial functions) (no 2) order 2025 (2) order shall come operation 2nd day august 2025

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977),
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 

the Minister for Climate, Energy and the Environment conferred on him – 

(a) 

by, or under, the Acts of the Oireachtas specified in Part 1 of the 
Schedule, 

(b) by, or under, the provisions of the Acts of the Oireachtas specified 

in Part 2 of the Schedule, and 

(c) 

under the Regulations or provisions of Regulations specified in 
Part 3 of the Schedule, 

are delegated to Timmy Dooley, Minister of State at the Department of Climate, 
Energy and the Environment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 29th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [384] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister climate energy environment conferred - (a) act oireachtas specified part 1 schedule (b) provision act oireachtas specified part 2 schedule (c) regulation provision regulation specified part 3 schedule delegated timmy dooley minister state department climate energy environment notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 29th july 2025 384 3

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977),
heading: Shannon Fisheries Act 1935 (No. 4 of 1935)
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Part 1 

Shannon Fisheries Act 1935 (No. 4 of 1935) 

Shannon Fisheries Act 1938 (No. 7 of 1938) 

Foyle Fisheries Act 1952 (No. 5 of 1952) 

Fisheries (Consolidation) Act 1959 (No. 14 of 1959) 

Fisheries (Amendment) Act 1962 (No. 31 of 1962) 

Fisheries (Amendment) Act 1978 (No. 18 of 1978) 

Fisheries Act 1980 (No. 1 of 1980) 

Fisheries (Amendment) Act 1995 (No. 27 of 1995) 

Dumping at Sea Act 1996 (No. 14 of 1996) 

Fisheries (Amendment) Act 1999 (No. 35 of 1999) 

Inland Fisheries Act 2010 (No. 10 of 2010) 

Microbeads (Prohibition) Act 2019 (No. 52 of 2019) 

Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021) 

Part 2 

Sections 11 and 16 of the Electricity (Supply) (Amendment) Act 1945 (No. 12 
of 1945) 

Section 6 of the Local Authorities (Works) Act 1949 (No. 17 of 1949) 

Sections 5, 6 and 10 of the Electricity (Supply) (Amendment) Act 1961 (No. 2 
of 1961) 

Part VIII of the British Irish Agreement Act 1999 (No. 1 of 1999) 

Section 32 of the Wildlife (Amendment) Act 2000 (No. 38 of 2000) 

Part 3 of the Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Amendment) Act 2009 (No. 39 of 
2009) 

Part 4 of the Gas (Amendment) and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (No. 11 
of 2024) 

Part 3 

Regulation 3, paragraph (8) of Regulation 12, and paragraphs (2) and (11) of 
Regulation 16 of the European Communities (Water Policy) Regulations 2003 
(S.I. No. 722 of 2003) 

Regulations 18, 19, 20 and 21 (other than in relation to the recovery of costs) of 
the European Communities Environmental Objectives (Surface Waters) 
Regulations 2009 (S.I. No. 272 of 2009) 

Regulation 9 of the European Communities Environmental Objectives 
(Freshwater Pearl Mussel) Regulations 2009 (S.I. No. 296 of 2009) 

 
 
 4 [384] 

Regulations 4 and 6 of the European Communities Environmental Objectives 
(Groundwater) Regulations 2010 (S.I. No. 9 of 2010) 

European Communities (Establishing an Infrastructure for Spatial Information 
in the European Community (INSPIRE)) Regulations 2010 (S.I. No 382 of 2010) 

European Communities (Marine Strategy Framework) Regulations 2011 (S.I. 
No. 249 of 2011) 

Regulations 42 and 53 of the European Communities (Birds and Natural 
Habitats) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 477 of 2011) 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

22 July, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [384] 5 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
